text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor Hurry up November!  Your a$$ needs to be voted out!!  You sack of shit!!!  You don’t give a shit about the  Coronavirus!  The US is spiking!  You need to be wearing a mask and encouraging others to do so!  YOU POS!!!!!
